phrs.translation: 差异性, 多样, 不同

sentences.sentence: Single data replica management strategy can not meet the complexity and diverseness in data grid.
sentences.translation: 单一策略的复本管理不能适应网格系统复杂、多变的环境。

sentences.sentence: Finally, attitude toward the execution of new curriculum schema of people with different professional title, seniority or educational background shows little diverseness .
sentences.translation: 不同职称、年资、学历对实施新课程纲要态度差异性不大。
